text: Hello :slightly_smiling_face: How can Macors and/or custom modules be used for dynamic HubDB pages? The corresponding variables should access HubdDB values. Can the HubDB tags, which are otherwise set directly in the tenmplate, be used here? I am new to this topic and would appreciate any helpful pro tips on how to avoid repetitive code in multi-level dynamic templates. :slightly_smiling_face: Thank you
